sentences.english: This paper presents the design conception of an ARM-based monitoring-control system used in a photovoltaic plant.
sentences.chinese: 提出一种基于ARM的光伏电站监控系统设计方案。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to an accurate timing-type solar photovoltaic controller.

sentences.english: Solar-thermal power stations have several advantages over solar-photovoltaic projects.
sentences.chinese: 跟光伏太阳能工程相比，太阳能热电站有好几个优点。

sentences.english: Completed in late 2008, it is the world's fourth largest photovoltaic power plant.
sentences.chinese: 于2008年底建成，是世界第四大光伏电站。

sentences.english: The actual market has long been abandoned impeach solar photovoltaic power station roof and network approach.
sentences.chinese: 市场实际早已抨弃了太阳能光伏屋顶并网电站的方式。

sentences.chinese: 该公司专攻用于光伏电池的硅晶片。
